title: "Trump Will Save The Squirrels": Elon Musk Mourns Peanut's Euthanasia
content: Elon Musk has criticised the Joe Biden administration, labelling it a "mindless and heartless killing machine" following the euthanasia of Peanut, the internet-famous squirrel confiscated by New York state officials.
summary: Elon Musk has criticised the Joe Biden administration, labelling it a "mindless and heartless killing machine" following the euthanasia of Peanut, the internet-famous squirrel confiscated by New York state officials.

title: Dramatic Debates, Assassination Attempts: Key  Moments In US Elections

title: Honouring Tom Bacon, The Forgotten Hero Of Apollos Moon Landing
content: Francis Thomas Bacon invented the hydrogen-oxygen fuel cell a clean, high-efficiency power source that helped propel Apollo 11s historic moon landing in 1969.
summary: Francis Thomas Bacon invented the hydrogen-oxygen fuel cell a clean, high-efficiency power source that helped propel Apollo 11s historic moon landing in 1969.

title: Animals Fear Humans More Than Lions In South Africa's Wild: Study
content: Over 10,000 recordings showed that 95% of animals reacted more strongly to human sounds than lion roars, challenging the belief that animals would habituate to humans in non-hunting environments.
summary: Over 10,000 recordings showed that 95% of animals reacted more strongly to human sounds than lion roars, challenging the belief that animals would habituate to humans in non-hunting environments.

title: Kamala Harris Recalls Mother Taking Her To India On Diwali

title: 15-Year-Old Boy In UK Given Life Sentence For Fatally Stabbing Teenager
content: A 15-year-old boy in the UK who fatally stabbed a teenager in Birmingham city centre has been sentenced to life.

title: Study Uncovers Major Causes of Gout, Debunking Common Myths
content: A major scientific breakthrough has overturned the long-held belief that gout is primarily caused by lifestyle factors like diet and alcohol consumption.

title: The Impact Of The World's Richest Man On US Democracy

title: Trump Makes Risky Last-Ditch Effort: Campaigns In New Mexico And Virginia

title: Woman Strips At Iran University To Protest Strict Dress Code: Reports
content: A young woman stripped to her underwear at an Iranian university on Saturday in an apparent protest against the country's strict Islamic dress code, according to online videos and media reports.

title: "Some Friends May Be More Complicated...": S Jaishankar On Diplomatic Ties

title: 19 Injured In Rocket Strike On Building In Israel's Arab Town Of Tira
content: A missile strike in Israel's Sharon area wounded 19 people, police said early Saturday, after the army reported three projectiles were fired from Lebanon into central Israel.

title: Amid Rising Attacks, Big March In Bangladesh For Hindus, Other Minorities
content: Hundreds marched in Bangladesh's capital Saturday to demand protections for Hindus and other minorities who say they have suffered violence and threats since the ouster of autocratic premier Sheikh Hasina.

title: Indian Firms Sanctioned By US Not In Violation Of National Laws: Centre
content: The Ministry of External Affairs (MEA) on Saturday reacted to the recent US sanctions imposed on several Indian firms and nationals, with a spokesperson stating that Indian companies have not violated any national laws.

title: Diwali Is Reminder South Asian Americans Have Enriched US: Blinken
content: Diwali is a reminder of the many ways Americans of South Asian descent have enriched the United States, Secretary of State Tony Blinken said Friday as he hosted the annual reception of the festival of lights.

title: Trump Pits Americans Against One Another, US Deserves Better: Harris
content: "America deserves better than what Donald Trump is offering. America deserves a president who understands our role and responsibility to our people and to the rest of the world to be a model," she said.
